abilities.name: Shining Horn
abilities.effect: As long as Pinsir is the only Pokémon you have in play, your opponent's Basic Pokémon can't attack.

attacks.name: Cry for Help
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a Grass Pokémon (excluding Pokémon-ex), show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Overhead Toss
attacks.effect: Does 20 damage to 1 of your Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
